versos: (guard) Proverbs 4:23 - "Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.";;;
(gershom) Exodus 18:3 - "and her two sons, of whom the name of one was gershom for he said, 'I have been a sojourner in a foreign land'.";;;
(jethro) Exodus 4:18: "Then Moses went back to jethro his father-in-law and said to him, 'Let me return to my own people in Egypt to see if any of them are still alive.'";;;
(onan) Genesis 38:9 - But onan knew that the child would not be his; so whenever he lay with his brothers wife, he spilled his semen on the ground to keep from providing offspring for his brother.;;;
(shelah) Numbers 26:20 - The sons of Judah were Er and Onan; and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.;;
(marry) 1 Corinthians 7:9 - "But if they cannot control themselves, they should marry, for it is better to marry than to burn with passion.";;;
(widow) 1 Timothy 5:3 - "Give proper recognition to those widows who are really in need.";;;

(grown) Isaiah 5:24 - Therefore, as tongues of fire lick up straw and as dry grass sinks down in the flames, so their roots will decay and their flowers blow away like dust; for they have rejected the law of the Lord Almighty and spurned the word of the Holy One of Israel.;;;
(timnath) Judges 14:1 - Samson went down to Timnah and saw there a young Philistine woman.;;;
(friend) Proverbs 17:17 - A friend loves at all times
(west) Isaiah 45:6 - "So that from the rising of the sun to the place of its setting people may know there is none besides me. I am the Lord, and there is no other.";;;

(signet) Esther 8:8 - "Now write another decree in the kings name in behalf of the Jews as seems best to you, and seal it with the kings signet ringfor no document written in the kings name and sealed with his ring can be revoked.";;;
(months) Revelation 9:10 - They had tails with stingers
(played) Job 21:11 - "They send forth their little ones like a flock, and their children skip about.";;;
(whoredom) "Hosea 4:10 - For they shall eat, and not have enough: they shall commit whoredom, and shall not increase: because they have left off to take heed to the LORD.";;;

(scarlet) Isaiah 1:18 - "Come now, let us settle the matter, says the Lord. Though your sins are like scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they are red as crimson, they shall be like wool.";;;
(breach) Isaiah 58:12 - "Your people will rebuild the ancient ruins and will raise up the age-old foundations; you will be called Repairer of Broken Walls, Restorer of Streets with Dwellings.";;;
